text.text: Upgrades are standard improvements to a tool. They are usually done by applying an item and 'rubbing off' some of its magic qualities, like redstone making tools faster.
Most tools start with around 3 upgrade slots, though it's possible to get more slots through other types of modifiers.
Thruul M'Gon's Puny Smelting has a full list of upgrades available on tools, along with the Encyclopedia of Tinkering.
